description:
The A-LAWS and Federation Forces are gathering a huge fleet to exterminate Celestial Being, and their leaders anticipate a final decisive battle. Aboard the Ptolemaios 2, Setsuna and his comrades gather their resolve for the coming battle. They each give voice to their determination, and crewmember Feldt Grace gives Setsuna a flower which once grew in his Middle Eastern homeland.
Source: crunchyroll
